hero.title: From proteome-wide binding maps to real-world decisions in drug development and precision medicine
hero.subtitle: We are a team of scientists and engineers dedicated to solving the world's most pressing challenges through innovative research and development.

proteinMicroarray.title: Protein Microarray
points: High throughput, analyzing thousands of proteins at once.
Ideal for biomarker discovery and proteome-wide analysis.

elisa.title: ELISA
points: Low throughput, analyzing one protein at a time.
Standard for quantifying specific, known proteins.
